CHAT.comment: Chi writes independently and sort of fluently in that she produces a lot of text in a reasonably short amount of time , but mutters words as she writes them and doesn't use punctuation much. Mot mostly watches or talks with EXP , asks Chi to read back what she's done so far , and suggests a clarification to the text (have you written more versus did you write more) , which Chi does not adopt. When Chi moves on to the second page , MOT says that Chi is <a writer>.

u.a: MOT goes off to look for something; perhaps Chi has glasses
MOT sits next to Chi , lights cigarette
talks about how long project will last , and about getting grants for research
talks with EXP about study; thought would stop in second grade
speaks softly under her breath as she writes .
Chi continues to say words softly under her breath as she writes
talks with experimenter about how her husband broke the screen door when he fell while he was taking out the garbage
bef Chi starts second page for letter
